channel.title: Randomise run

item.title: Randomise run
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

yo,

i want my bot to randomly click run between 50-100% run, currently im using

if(getMyPlayer().isMoving()) {
if (walking.getEnergy() >= 50) {
CheckVersion();
walking.setRun(true);
log("Toggling Run");
}
}

the bot always pretty much clicks run when it hits 50%, could I use misc.random for this?

(this is here, because itâ€™s the same concept as rsps).

Thank-you.

Read full topic
